en-us.text: Mobile application developed to a Physical Store to manage Orders, Deliveries, Products Stock and integration with multiples platforms: Nuvemshop, Mercado Livre, MelhorEnvio (Shipping Company), PagSeguro (Payment Gateway), Mercado Pago (Payment Gateway) and others.

A RESTful API to controls and manage a Physical Store Database. Built respecting all SOLID principles, this API was developed to support another application (Mobile). It was integrated with GCP (Google Cloud Platform) and uses its main tools: Cloud Storage, Real Time - DB, FCM, Firebase Authentication, etc.
